lead_paragraph: The Flyers are back in a more familiar position in the standings. Jeff Carter and Sami Kapanen scored 34 seconds apart in the second period last night, and Martin Biron was sensational again in leading Philadelphia past visiting Atlanta, 4-0. Biron made 31 saves in his first shutout since the Flyers acquired him from Buffalo in February to solidify the No. 1 goaltender spot. The Flyers are alone in first place in the Atlantic Division.
